remarks: Element of the value of an operation given by a maps-to rule, where the first argument is a pair and the base set of the second argument is the first component of the first argument.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens and Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2017.)
statement:
mpt2xopoveq.f $e |- F = ( x e. _V , y e. ( 1st ` x ) |-> { n e. ( 1st ` x ) | ph } ) $.
mpt2xopovel $p |- ( ( V e. X /\ W e. Y ) -> ( N e. ( <. V , W >. F K ) <-> ( K e. V /\ N e. V /\ [. <. V , W >. / x ]. [. K / y ]. [. N / n ]. ph ) ) ) $.
$d K n x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d V n x y $.
$d W n x y $.
$d X n x y $.
$d Y n x y $.
